channel.title: Does it matter whether you use tor or plain iceweasel inside whonix ?
channel.description: It is my understanding that the point of whonix is to use tor at a fundamental level so the OS doesn't even know the computer's local IP. So my question is what difference does it make whether you use Tor browser or plain firefox inside whonix ? Also does using tor browser mean that you're using tor "twice" in the sense that tor browser will wrap packets to go through tor and whonix will rewrap those packets a second time ?

item.title: Does it matter whether you use tor or plain iceweasel inside whonix ?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Regard this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Does it matter whether you use tor or plain iceweasel inside whonix ?
item.dc:creator: user102
item.description:
It is my understanding that the point of whonix is to use tor at a fundamental level so the OS doesn’t even know the computer’s local IP. So my question is what difference does it make whether you use Tor browser or plain firefox inside whonix ? Also does using tor browser mean that you’re using tor “twice” in the sense that tor browser will wrap packets to go through tor and whonix will rewrap those packets a second time ?
